title: Sampler, early 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in counted cross stitches on plain weave foundation
provenance: Ex. coll. Fraser-Martin. Donor's Notes: "Gift of Sylvester Fraser 1922, from Easton, PA."
creditline: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
description: Many bands of alphabets and numerals, separated by narrow geometric borders, embroidered in blue and brown.

tombstone.epitaph:

early 19th century. Medium: cotton embroidery on cotton foundation
